posts.post_content:
Hello all.

Trying to piece together some Sam Crawford cards for my personal collection.

Since I am not on an unlimited budget...I am not looking for any high grade expensive examples, but looking for cards with nice eye appeal ...graded or ungraded  does not matter.

I have picked up a few cards from fellow board members and other sources recently.. (I had a post about a month ago on the pre WWII thread and that got me 3 new cards for my collection) ......so thought I would just throw a note out here to see what might be available from anyone that are T206's  

The only example I currently own of a T206 Crawford is an Old Mill Crawford Batting

If you have anything available feel free to post here or send me a PM. 

Happy Collecting!

Dave

sorry I mistakenly put my only Crawford was a throwing pose with old mill back from T206 but it is actually the batting pose...Sorry to those who all emailed me looking to try and purchase this card :)

However...I am still looking for other T206 Crawfords...so if you have anything that might fit the bill of my initial post, please let me know.

Thanks!
